EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, BLUE HULL, 19 PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 33-18N 011-44E
   AT 120120Z MAY. VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
   3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
   3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1479/18.
